article_title: HealthCare.gov, H-P Can’t Afford Site Migration Mistakes
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: As consumers continue to face challenges purchasing health insurance through HealthCare.gov, Hewlett-Packard is migrating the exchange’s data and will replicate it between two data centers.
twitter.title: HealthCare.gov, H-P Can’t Afford Site Migration Mistakes
